title: Server Essential Menu
author: JMAFK
description: The ultimate menu system for Bedrock servers. Includes warps, TPA, and admin tools.
long_description:
# Server Essential Menu

This addon provides a comprehensive GUI menu for your server or realm.

## Features
- **Teleport System:** Warp to hubs and custom locations.
- **TPA:** Request to teleport to other players.
- **Admin Tools:** Ban, kick, and manage the server easily.

## Installation
1. Download the pack.
2. Import into Minecraft.
3. Apply to your world.

title: Casino System [JMAFK]
author: JMAFK
description: A fully functional economy and gambling script. Add slots and blackjack to your world.
long_description:
# Casino JMAFK

Bring the excitement of a casino to your Bedrock world using the Script API.

## Games Included
- **Slot Machines:** Spin to win currency.
- **Blackjack:** Play against the dealer.

**Requires:** Beta APIs enabled.

title: Advance Land Claim
author: JMAFK
description: Protect your builds! Advanced plot protection and land claiming for multiplayer.
long_description:
# Advance Land Claim

Stop griefers instantly.

## How to use
1. Get the claiming tool.
2. Select corner A and corner B.
3. Type `/claim` to protect your area.

Includes permission sharing with friends!

title: Below Name & Proximity Chat
author: JMAFK
description: Immersive chat features. See messages below player names and chat based on distance.
long_description:
# Proximity Chat Script

Enhance roleplay with this script.

## Features
- **Below Name:** Chat messages appear instantly under the player's nametag.
- **Proximity:** Only players within X blocks can see your chat.
- **Config:** customizable radius.
